summary: Email chain between Assistant U.S. Attorney and defense attorney Marc Weinstein regarding the SDNY's request for a deposition transcript from a 2009 civil case involving Jeffrey Epstein. The AUSA identifies the plaintiff's attorney and Epstein's defense team from that case.

persons.name: Marc A. Weinstein
persons.role: Defense Attorney, Partner at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP
persons.context: Attorney communicating with the SDNY about locating a deposition transcript from a 2009 civil case involving Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Andrew Tomback
persons.context: CC'd recipient on the email chain between Marc Weinstein and the Assistant U.S. Attorney.

persons.name: Jack Scarola
persons.context: Identified by the AUSA as the attorney who represented the plaintiff in the 2009 deposition.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the SDNY investigation; was represented by Mark Luttier and Bob Critton in a 2009 civil deposition.

persons.name: Mark Luttier
persons.context: Identified by the AUSA as one of Jeffrey Epstein's attorneys in the 2009 deposition, from the firm Critton, Luttier, and Coleman LLP.

persons.name: Bob Critton
persons.context: Identified by the AUSA as one of Jeffrey Epstein's attorneys in the 2009 deposition, from the firm Critton, Luttier, and Coleman LLP.

connections.description: Mark Luttier represented Jeffrey Epstein in a 2009 civil deposition.
Bob Critton represented Jeffrey Epstein in a 2009 civil deposition.
Weinstein is communicating with an AUSA from the SDNY to assist in locating a deposition transcript for an investigation.
Scarola represented the plaintiff in the 2009 civil case against Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Civil Deposition of Plaintiff
events.description: A deposition took place in a civil case where the plaintiff was represented by Jack Scarola and Jeffrey Epstein was represented by Mark Luttier and Bob Critton.

events.title: SDNY Request for Deposition Transcript
events.description: The Southern District of New York contacts defense attorney Marc Weinstein to request a transcript of a 2009 deposition related to their investigation.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The Southern District of New York was actively investigating Jeffrey Epstein-related matters as of September 2020.
The investigation sought a transcript from a 2009 civil deposition where Epstein was defended by attorneys Mark Luttier and Bob Critton.
The plaintiff in that 2009 case was represented by attorney Jack Scarola.
Defense attorney Marc A. Weinstein of Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP was contacted to assist in locating the deposition transcript.
